00009 template <typename real, unsigned int dim = 3>
00010 class CatmullRomBlend {
00011   
00012 protected:
00013 
00014   real tau; 
00015   
00016 public:   
00017   
00020     CatmullRomBlend (real tension = 0.5) {
00021         tau = tension; 
00022     }
00023 
00028     inline void blendFactors (real u, real factor []) const {
00029       real u1 = u;
00030       real u2 = u*u;
00031       real u3 = u2*u;
00032       factor [0] = -tau * u1 + 2 * tau * u2 - tau * u3;
00033       factor [1] = 1 + (tau-3) * u2 + (2 - tau) * u3;
00034       factor [2] = tau * u1 + (3 - 2*tau) * u2 + (tau - 2) * u3;
00035       factor [3] = -tau * u2 + tau * u3;
00036     }
00037   
00046     inline void blendPoint (real u, const real p0[], const real p1[], 
00047                             const real p2[], const real p3[], real p[]) const {
00048         real bf [4];
00049         blendFactors (u,bf);
00050         for (int j = 0; j < dim; j++) {
00051             p[j] = p0[j]*bf[0]+ 
00052                    p1[j]*bf[1]+
00053                    p2[j]*bf[2]+
00054                    p3[j]*bf[3];
00055         }
00056     }
00057 };
00058 #endif
